title: Age of Mythology: Extended Edition
notes: You need to set launch option in Steam : PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command% Else it will not start, also bypass launcher when launching it in Steam

title: Age of Mythology: Extended Edition
notes: Crashes when viewing postgame timeline, otherwise no problems

title: Age of Mythology: Extended Edition
notes: Launch options "PROTON_USE_WINE3D11=1 %command%" and select (Bypass Launcher) at start.

title: Age of Mythology: Extended Edition

notes: Used the "PROTON_USE_WINE3D11=1 %command%" launch setting. Without that, game stutters sometimes. Runs a little slower than normal, still perfectly playable though.
title: Age of Mythology: Extended Edition

notes: Bypassing the launcher and using Wine D3D11 was needed. Game mostly runs fine, but it lags a bit and load times are long.
